deity_markdown: [Aonaurious](/Deities.aspx?ID=581), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=447), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Izuyaku](/Deities.aspx?ID=348), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=648), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=481), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=460), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=495), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269), [Tjasse](/Deities.aspx?ID=498), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=682)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 335 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=23), [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=27)

**Deities**
[Aonaurious](/Deities.aspx?ID=581), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=447), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Izuyaku](/Deities.aspx?ID=348), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=648), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=481), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=460), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=495), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269), [Tjasse](/Deities.aspx?ID=498), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=682)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition and can use the extra action each round for only Strike and Stride actions.

---
**Heightened (7th)** You can target up to 6 creatures.
name: Haste
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 335 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=23), [Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=27)

**Deities**
[Aonaurious](/Deities.aspx?ID=581), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=447), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286), [Izuyaku](/Deities.aspx?ID=348), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=648), [Kurgess](/Deities.aspx?ID=351), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=481), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Shyka](/Deities.aspx?ID=460), [Skode](/Deities.aspx?ID=495), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [The Divine Dare](/Deities.aspx?ID=269), [Tjasse](/Deities.aspx?ID=498), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=451), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=682)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.
</summary>
summary: Speed up a creature so it can attack or move more often.
